creators.description:
Name: Sarah Greenwood
Brand: Sarah-N-Tuned
Location: Tuscan, AZ
Segment: Automotive

Bio: Sarah is a car builder and former aerospace mechanic for the USAF. Her YouTube channel focuses on project builds and she wants to include more car reviews. Sarah previously wrote for cars on TFLCars.com and has built a loyal following over the years. 

DriveShop Programs: 
2018 SEMA Young Guns

Spotlight Programs: 
2023 Audi

Name: Matt Farah
Location: Los Angeles, CA
Segment: Automotive Reviews

Bio: Matt Farah is a lifelong car enthusiast who began his automotive career at dealerships, rental agencies, and detail shops before discovering the power of YouTube in 2006.   He moved to CA and started The Smoking Tire in 2009 with the goal of filling an irreverent, yet professional niche in automotive media, an effort that continues today with over 1 million subscribers on the channel   He was a host and creator of the show ‘TUNED’ on the /DRIVE YouTube network from 2011 to 2014, and appeared on /DRIVE on NBC Sports, ‘The Car Show’ on the Speed Channel, and ‘Attack of the Show’ on the G4 Network.   His podcast, The Smoking Tire Podcast, started in 2011, is #1 in the category every week of the year, with 3-6 episodes in the top ten for the Automotive category on iTunes. Going into its second decade with a catalog 750+ episodes deep, The Smoking Tire podcast is the definitive guest stop for who’s who in the auto industry.   Farah has an extensive writing resume, having contributed reviews and editorials to HAGERTY Magazine, Popular Mechanics, and online publications including TheDrive and Jalopnik. He is currently the Editor-at-Large for Road & Track Magazine  Having just turned 40, Farah is redefining how car collectors keep, maintain, and use their cars in the densely populated beach cities around LA with his venture Westside Collector Car Storage, a game-changer in luxury, concierge parking that sold out soon after opening, and is expanding to a second location to open winter 2022.  No stranger to the trials and tribulations of old cars himself, Farah’s stable currently includes a Ferrari 328 GTS, a collector-grade 2005 BMW M3, an imported JDM Van, several motorcycles, and his dream car: the 1988 Lamborghini Countach. not testing new sports cars, he daily drives a Ford Mach E.

Media Outlet: A Girl's Guide to Cars

Bio: A Girl's Guide to Cars is a dedicated advocate for empowering girls in the automotive world, aiming to offer a comprehensive guide that cultivates confidence and knowledge for a joyful and informed journey into car ownership. Committed to breaking stereotypes, this outlet actively works towards creating a supportive community within the Girls Guide to Cars.

Name: Forrest Jones
Location: Dallas, TX (recently relocated from Los Angeles, CA - July 2024)
Segment: Automotive Reviews

Bio: Forrest Jones is responsible for Forrest Jones Auto Reviews, providing  the most in-depth car review possible while also sharing his passion for cars and the entire automotive industry. Coverage includes affordable cars, supercars, exotic cars, hyper car and everything in-between.

Bio: Drake is an automotive reviewer from Los Angeles. His primary platform is TikTok, which has over 360k followers and 16M likes. He frequently shares videos on automotive updates, car reviews, and features with his audience with consistent metrics.

Name: Christopher Brower
Media Outlet: The Topher
Location: Detroit
Segment: Automotive Reviews

I've been a car & driving enthusiast for as long as I can remember. My career began as a photographer until I re-launched the Winding Road Magazine YouTube channel, pioneering the POV car video & review genre. TheTopher is my personal channel where I review press cars, my personal vehicles, and everything else I manage to get my hands on.
